blocks.name: exple2lt6
blocks.content: A nonnegative integer to the power of itself is less than 6 if it is less than or equal to 2. (Contributed by AV, 16-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm exple2lt6(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, nat2)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6))
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, nat2)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6), w3o(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2)))
  nn0le2is012(c0)
  3jaoi(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c0, nat2), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6))
  syl6eqbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6, co(nat0, cexp, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat0, nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  id(wceq(c0, nat0))
  eqbrtri(co(nat0, cexp, nat0), clt, nat6, nat1)
  0exp0e1()
  syl6eqbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6, co(nat1, cexp, nat1), wceq(c0, nat1))
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat1, nat1, wceq(c0, nat1))
  id(wceq(c0, nat1))
  eqbrtri(co(nat1, cexp, nat1), clt, nat6, nat1)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat1, cexp, nat1), nat1), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  exp1(nat1)
  1lt6()
  syl6eqbr(co(c0, cexp, c0), clt, nat6, co(nat2, cexp, nat2), wceq(c0, nat2))
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat2, nat2, wceq(c0, nat2))
  id(wceq(c0, nat2))
  eqbrtri(co(nat2, cexp, nat2), clt, nat6, nat4)
  sq2()
  4lt6()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm exple2lt6(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0[≤]2)→(c0[^]c0)[<]6)
} = {
  syl((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0[≤]2), (c0[^]c0)[<]6, (c0 = 0 ∨ c0 = 1 ∨ c0 = 2))
  nn0le2is012(c0)
  3jaoi(c0 = 0, c0 = 1, c0 = 2, (c0[^]c0)[<]6)
  syl6eqbr((c0[^]c0), clt, nat6, (0[^]0), c0 = 0)
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat0, nat0, c0 = 0)
  id(c0 = 0)
  eqbrtri((0[^]0), clt, nat6, nat1)
  0exp0e1()
  syl6eqbr((c0[^]c0), clt, nat6, (1[^]1), c0 = 1)
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat1, nat1, c0 = 1)
  id(c0 = 1)
  eqbrtri((1[^]1), clt, nat6, nat1)
  ax-mp((1[^]1)= 1, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  exp1(nat1)
  1lt6()
  syl6eqbr((c0[^]c0), clt, nat6, (2[^]2), c0 = 2)
  oveq12d(c0, cexp, c0, nat2, nat2, c0 = 2)
  id(c0 = 2)
  eqbrtri((2[^]2), clt, nat6, nat4)
  sq2()
  4lt6()
}

blocks.name: pgrple2abl
blocks.content: Every symmetric group on a set with at most 2 elements is abelian. (Contributed by AV, 16-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pgrple2abl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wcel(c2, cabl))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csymg, c0))
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wcel(c2, cabl), wcel(c2, cgrp), wbr(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c2)), clt, nat6))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  symggrp(c0, c1, c2)
  eqbrtrd(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c2)), clt, nat6, cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  symghash(c0, cfv(cbs, c2), c2)
  lelttrd(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), nat6, co(cfv(chash, c0), cexp, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)))
  nnred(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wcel(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  faccl(cfv(chash, c0))
  nn0red(co(cfv(chash, c0), cexp, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)))
  nn0expcld(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wcel(nat6, cr))
  6re()
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), cle, co(cfv(chash, c0), cexp, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  facubnd(cfv(chash, c0))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2), wbr(co(cfv(chash, c0), cexp, cfv(chash, c0)), clt, nat6), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, nat2), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  hashbnd(c0, c1, nat2)
  hashcl(c0)
  exple2lt6(cfv(chash, c0))
  lt6abl(c2, cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
}

blocks.name: pgrpgt2nabl
blocks.content: Every symmetric group on a set with more than 2 elements is not abelian, see also the remark in [Rotman] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 21-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pgrpgt2nabl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wnel(c2, cabl))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csymg, c0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wnel(c2, cabl), wn(wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))))))
  intnand(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))))
  intnand(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wn(wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  mpsyl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wss(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  mpsyl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wss(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  symgtrf(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2), c0, c2)
  eqid(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfn), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  hashcl(c0)
  adantld(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  biimpd(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  bitrd(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpan(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wb(wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  nn0ltp1le(nat2, cfv(chash, c0))
  breq1d(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cle, cfv(chash, c0), nat3, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  a1i(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3))
  2p1e3()
  com12(wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wi(wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  syl5breqr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0), cpnf, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))))
  ax-mp(wbr(nat3, cle, cpnf), wcel(nat3, cxr))
  rexri(nat3)
  3re()
  pnfge(nat3)
  hashinf(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  pmtr3ncom(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpmtr, c0))
  rexcom(hs0, hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  reximdv(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wss(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  ssrexv(hs1, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  ssrexv(hs0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  2rexbidva(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))), wne(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  neeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  symgov(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), c2, c0)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  pm3.22(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  symgov(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c2, c0)
  bitr3i(wn(wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wn(wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))))
  rexnal(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))
  rexbii(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wn(wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))
  bitr3i(wn(wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wn(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))
  rexnal(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))
  rexbii(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wn(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))

  df-ne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))
  xchbinx(wnel(c2, cabl), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c2, cabl))
  df-nel(c2, cabl)
  bitri(wcel(c2, cabl), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, ccmn)))
  isabl(c2)
  anbi2i(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, ccmn), wa(wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c2, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pgrpgt2nabl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ 2[<](# ` c0))→ c2 ∉ Abel)
  ⊣ c2 =(SymGrp ` c0)
